oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dr. Lloyd E. Davis' Biographical Sketch
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: American Academy of Veterinary Pharmacology and Therapeutics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A short biography of Dr. Lloyd E. Davis, professor of veterinary pharmacology and clinical medicineat the University of Illinois College of Veterinary Medicine at Urbana. Dr. Davis was honored for his numerous contributions to AA VPT and to the discipline of veterinary and comparative pharmacology.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: AAVPT Biennial Symposia; Sixth Biennial Symposium; 12-13
